LightningComponentBundle.description: Display at-a-glance visual representations of status, values, and key details about a record.

property.name: indText
property.label: Static Text
property.description: (Optional) The Static Text used when being used instead of Field, Icon, or Image URL. NOTE: Displays first 3 characters / emojis

property.name: indImage
property.label: Image
property.description: (Optional) The URL to the image of the Indicator when being used instead of Field, Text, or Icon.

property.name: indIcon
property.label: Icon
property.description: (Optional) The Lightning Design System icon from https://lightningdesignsystem.com/icons/ when being used instead of Field, Text, or Image URL.

property.name: indHoverText
property.label: Hover Text
property.description: The hover text of the Indicator.

property.name: indBackgroundColor
property.label: Background Color
property.description: (Optional) Override the default background of the Indicator's Salesforce Icon.

property.name: indForegroundColor
property.label: Foreground Color
property.description: (Optional) Override the default foreground of the Indicator's Salesforce Icon.
